item.title: CVE-2024-25094|2024-06-04T17:35:36.033Z -- paul%20jura%20%26%20nicolas%20montigny -- pj%20news%20ticker
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Paul Jura & Nicolas Montigny PJ News Ticker allows Stored XSS.This issue affects PJ News Ticker: from n/a through 1.9.5.
